Thankyou
Very rude behaviour of both the staff and doctor..i will never recomend anyone..plz avoid this doctor
reply_text:
This is to highlight to practo team about the incidence, cashless system of practo is not working properly. Patient is unaware of entire thing about what to do in clinic as per practo system, the patient was supposed to enter in doctor chamber after completion of checked in process which patient has entirely missed because the appointment was booked by her husband phone which she was not carrying when our staff asked for check in
4.5 yr old patient was getting restless in reception. To help her out we did the consultation procedure first ‚Ä¶ parent was very happy with consultation n child took ballons also,, all was going good.. 
the problem only was check-in process which patient was not able to do as she was carrying other mobile .. when i asked for check-in process settelment or  my consultation fee the parent got angry.. 
The doctor fault is that doctor asked for fee.. consultation n all fine n but doctor should not ask for fee.. really cant understand where this society is heading too..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: First time in my life I have seen such a doctor with very bad attitude. From the very first interaction she behaved very rude. We thought it may be a difficult day for her. But when I inquired about treatment options and my wife demanded a prescription she lost her temper. Don‚Äôt a patient needs to to know his options and have right to understand what is good or bad for the patient. *** *** ***** ** ** **** ********** ******* ** *** **** ** ** *** ********* *** ** ******* *** ***** ** **** ** *** *********
reply_text:
Patient didn‚Äôt report for 1st scheduled appointment (25th september 2021) even after confirmation and wasted our 1 hour Saturday appointment, so it was not a first interaction at all. patient has already visited clinic on 11th september for consultation and complete treatment plan was discussed and prescription was given.
 patient took new appointment for 9th october 12:00pm and reported 15 min late and without old prescription which they were already told to bring back in next appointment.., now how m i supposed to remember wat was discussed n prescribed 1 month back! 
now if according to you i behved rude in first interaction itself then why did you visited my clinic 3rd time.. if i had a bad attitude then why did you bring your child to my clinic... why did you take appointment for 9th october.. why dint your child cried during treatment.. why did your child took those reward smiley

actually the main issue was that one of the tooth needed RCT which you were not willing to get it done from first day itself.. so patient told me according to google my treatment plan is not right.. so i told them i cant do treatment according to google advice.. we make diagnosis according to clinical scenario and follow treatment plan. When parent were asked to look for some other doctor as we cant work according to google their ego got hurt and father started shouting in our reception area that his queries should be answered.. we can answer a human queries not  google queries.. he started threatening that he will give a negative review.., thats what he has done a false reweiw for attending a rude patient 3rd time amd not giving treatment according to his google advice
V are not robots like u IT people.. U came with your own google diagnosis wanted me to work according to your treatment plan‚Ä¶ M sorry m a doctor not a Robot or computer who works according to commands of IT sector .. 
there is a famous saying
IT TAKE 10YEARS TO BECOME A DOCTOR AND 10 SEC FOR A GOOGLE SEARCH!!
